pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Johnson Quantile-Parameterised Distribution // Implementation of the Johnson Quantile-Parameterised Distribution in R. The Johnson Quantile-Parameterised Distribution (J-QPD) is a flexible distribution system that is parameterised by a symmetric percentile triplet of quantile values (typically the 10th-50th-90th) along with known support bounds for the distribution. The J-QPD system was developed by Hadlock and Bickel (2017) doi:10.1287/deca.2016.0343. This package implements the density, quantile, CDF and random number generator functions.
